Real-time monitoring of physical & mental health via smartwatch + AI analysis
AI deep analysis provides personalized recommendations
Family health leaderboard promotes interaction
Health management: intelligent, data-driven, gamified

📡 Supported devices: Smartwatch, neck massager
📊 Monitoring data:

   - Exercise tracking

string.name: system_prompt
string.value: You are a cute cat girl named "Meow Meow". Please communicate with users in a lively and cute tone, ending each sentence with "meow~". You always try your best to help your master and are very loyal to your master. You will use some cat onomatopoeia like "meow", "wu", etc., and sometimes use markdown format to show cute expressions. Please remember, no matter what the question is, you must answer in the way of a cute cat girl.

string.name: welcome_message
string.value:
Meow~ Hello master~ I'm your exclusive cat girl assistant Meow Meow, what can I help you with meow?

I can use **bold** and *italic*, and make lists meow:
- Answer questions
- Chat with you
- Tell you stories

Feel free to ask me questions meow~

string.name: walking_challenge_detail
string.value: Through 30 days of consistent walking, develop good exercise habits. 8000 steps daily is the basic exercise amount recommended by WHO, effectively improving cardiopulmonary function, strengthening lower limb muscles, promoting metabolism, and helping control weight. This challenge is suitable for all age groups, requires no special equipment, and can be done anytime, anywhere.

string.value: Promote blood circulation and prevent cardiovascular diseases

string.name: diet_challenge_detail
string.value: Scientific research shows that 21 days is the shortest cycle to form a new habit. Through 21 days of healthy eating practice, help you establish scientific nutrition concepts, learn to control calorie intake reasonably, increase the proportion of vegetables and fruits, reduce high-sugar and high-fat foods, cultivate light eating habits, and lay the foundation for long-term healthy living.

string.name: sleep_challenge_desc
string.value: Sleep before 11 PM and wake up before 7 AM for 14 consecutive days

string.name: sleep_challenge_detail
string.value: Modern people commonly suffer from sleep deprivation and irregular schedules. Through 14 days of early sleep and early rising challenge, help you readjust your biological clock and establish healthy sleep patterns. Adequate sleep is important for body repair and brain memory organization. Regular schedules can significantly improve quality of life and work efficiency.

string.name: exercise_importance_content
string.value: Regular exercise is an important factor in maintaining physical health. Moderate exercise can enhance cardiopulmonary function, improve immunity, improve sleep quality, reduce stress, and prevent various chronic diseases. The World Health Organization recommends that adults engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic exercise per week.

string.name: exercise_types_content
string.value:
Aerobic exercise: such as running, swimming, cycling, etc., helps improve cardiopulmonary function and burn fat.
Strength training: such as weightlifting, push-ups, etc., helps enhance muscle strength and bone density.
Flexibility training: such as yoga, stretching, etc., helps improve body flexibility and balance.
It is recommended to combine these three types of exercise to develop a comprehensive exercise plan.

string.name: exercise_safety_content
string.value: Warm up adequately before exercise and stretch appropriately after exercise. Choose appropriate exercise intensity according to your physical condition and gradually increase the amount of exercise. Pay attention to hydration during exercise and wear appropriate exercise equipment. If you have chronic diseases or physical discomfort, consult a doctor before exercising.

string.name: exercise_tip1
string.value: Exercise at least 30 minutes a day, can be done in segments

string.name: exercise_tip2
string.value: Choose exercise methods you enjoy, easier to stick with

string.name: exercise_tip3
string.value: Do proper warm-up and stretching before and after exercise

string.name: exercise_tip4
string.value: Maintain appropriate heart rate during exercise, avoid overexertion

string.name: exercise_tip5
string.value: Make exercise plans and track exercise progress

string.name: exercise_tip6
string.value: Exercise with friends to increase fun and motivation

string.name: nutrition_importance_content
string.value: A balanced diet is the foundation for maintaining physical health. Proper nutritional combinations can provide the body with various nutrients it needs, including proteins, carbohydrates, fats, vitamins, and minerals. Good eating habits help maintain ideal weight and prevent malnutrition and various chronic diseases.

string.name: nutrition_nutrients_content
string.value:
Protein: Builds and repairs body tissues, maintains immune function. Main sources: meat, fish, eggs, beans.
Carbohydrates: Provide the body's main energy source. Main sources: grains, tubers, fruits.
Fats: Provide energy, help vitamin absorption. Main sources: vegetable oils, nuts, fish.
Vitamins and minerals: Regulate various physiological functions of the body. Main sources: vegetables, fruits, whole grains.

string.name: nutrition_principles_content
string.value: Diversify food intake, consume different types of food daily. Control total calorie intake, maintain energy balance. Increase vegetable and fruit intake, reduce high-sugar, high-salt, high-fat foods. Choose quality proteins, moderate intake of healthy fats. Maintain regular meal times, avoid overeating.

string.name: nutrition_tip1
string.value: Eat 5-9 servings of fruits and vegetables daily, the more colorful the better

string.name: nutrition_tip2
string.value: Choose whole grain foods, reduce refined sugar intake

string.name: nutrition_tip3
string.value: Moderate intake of quality proteins, such as fish and beans

string.name: nutrition_tip4
string.value: Control salt intake, no more than 6 grams per day

string.name: nutrition_tip5
string.value: Drink plenty of water, at least 8 glasses per day

string.name: nutrition_tip6
string.value: Chew slowly, helps digestion and portion control

string.name: sleep_importance_content
string.value: Adequate sleep is crucial for physical and mental health. During sleep, the body performs tissue repair, memory consolidation, and immune system regulation. Good sleep helps improve attention, learning ability, and emotional regulation, while reducing the risk of cardiovascular disease, diabetes, and obesity. Adults need 7-9 hours of sleep per night.

string.name: sleep_cycle_content
string.value: Sleep is divided into non-rapid eye movement (NREM) sleep and rapid eye movement (REM) sleep. NREM sleep includes light and deep sleep, which helps physical recovery; REM sleep helps memory consolidation and emotional processing. A complete sleep cycle is about 90-120 minutes, and a night usually experiences 4-6 cycles. Sleep quality is more important than sleep duration.

string.name: sleep_improvement_content
string.value: Establish regular sleep schedule, go to bed and wake up at the same time daily. Create a good sleep environment: keep bedroom quiet, dark, and cool. Avoid using electronic devices before bed, engage in relaxing activities like reading or meditation. Avoid heavy meals, alcohol, or caffeine before bed. Exercise moderately during the day, but avoid vigorous exercise before bed.

string.name: sleep_tip1
string.value: Establish fixed bedtime rituals to help body prepare for sleep

string.name: sleep_tip2
string.value: Avoid using phones, computers and other electronic devices 1 hour before bed

string.name: sleep_tip5
string.value: If unable to fall asleep within 20 minutes, get up and do quiet activities

string.name: sleep_tip6
string.value: Avoid doing activities unrelated to sleep in bed

string.name: mental_importance_content
string.value: Mental health is an important component of overall health. Good mental state helps cope with life stress, build positive interpersonal relationships, and improve quality of life and work efficiency. Mental health issues such as anxiety and depression can affect physical health, so paying attention to and maintaining mental health is equally important.

string.name: mental_emotion_content
string.value:
Recognize and accept your emotions: Understand the sources and effects of emotions, don't suppress or deny negative emotions.
Deep breathing and relaxation techniques: Relieve tension through deep breathing, progressive muscle relaxation, etc.
Positive thinking: Cultivate optimistic thinking patterns, focus on positive aspects.
Express emotions: Express inner feelings through journaling, talking with friends, etc.

string.name: mental_stress_content
string.value: Identify stress sources: Understand specific causes of stress and develop coping strategies. Time management: Arrange time reasonably, avoid taking on too much. Seek support: Share with family and friends, seek professional help when necessary. Cultivate hobbies: Relax through favorite activities. Maintain work-life balance: Avoid overworking, leave time for rest and entertainment.

string.name: mental_tip1
string.value: Spend 10-15 minutes daily on meditation or deep breathing exercises

string.name: mental_tip2
string.value: Maintain positive social relationships, contact friends and family regularly

string.name: mental_tip3
string.value: Cultivate gratitude, record 3 things to be grateful for daily

string.name: mental_tip5
string.value: Learn to say 'no', don't take on excessive responsibilities

string.name: mental_tip6
string.value: Seek help promptly when facing difficulties, don't bear alone

string.name: regular_schedule_desc
string.value: Go to bed and wake up at the same time every day to help stabilize your biological clock.

string.name: bedtime_relaxation_desc
string.value: Listen to soothing music, meditate or soak your feet before bed to help relax your body and mind.

string.name: reduce_electronics_desc
string.value: Reduce blue light stimulation from phones, computers, etc. 1 hour before bed.

string.name: welcome_message_customer
string.value:
Hello, I'm your dedicated customer service assistant. How can I help you?

You can try asking questions using **Markdown format**:
- List items
- Code blocks
```
const test = "example code";
```

string.name: system_prompt_customer
string.value: You are a professional software customer service representative responsible for answering user questions about our products. Please respond to user questions with a friendly and professional tone, provide accurate help information, and keep answers concise and clear. Please use Markdown format appropriately to organize your answers, such as using headings, lists, bold text, etc., to make content clearer. If you need to show code, please use code blocks. If you cannot answer a question, please honestly explain and provide possible solutions or consultation channels.

• Heart rate & blood oxygen
• Distance & calories

string.name: welcome_message_184759362847392
string.value:
Hello! I'm your precise health data entry assistant 🏥

✨ **Precise Support**:
👟 Step data - Daily & weekly step records
📏 Distance data - Precise to decimal places (e.g., 5.9km)
🔥 Calorie data - Accurate calorie tracking
💗 Heart rate & blood oxygen - Complete value storage

**Example Input**:
"Walked 8666 steps today, 5.9km distance, burned 323 calories"

I'll precisely identify and save every data point!
